sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">En una estrategia de actualización a Liferay DXP, se deben tener en cuenta: el entorno, la base de datos y los plugins. Durante esta sesión os mostraremos claves de los procesos de actualización que junto con los casos reales de Carrefour y la sesión posterior, te harán decidirte a cambiar a la última versión.
<br>
En el caso de Carrefour se explicará como Liferay ha ayudado al área de RRHH a ofrecer una experiencia digital omnicanal e integral a sus empleados, unificando el acceso a los procesos de recursos humanos; evaluación del desempeño anual, planes de acción, gamificación, acceso a información personal como el recibo de nómina o el certificado de retenciones; trabajo en equipo gracias a los Sites de Comunidades; celebración de eventos a nivel Compañía compartiendo fotos y vídeos, además de difundir las noticias del Grupo. <br>
<b>Actualizar a DXP permite, además, mejorar la experiencia de usuarios y gestores de contenidos gracias al diseño Lexicon, mejor integración de la parte Social Office en la plataforma y reducir los requisitos de infraestructura gracias a la modularidad.</b></Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
En una estrategia de actualización a Liferay DXP, se deben tener en cuenta: el entorno, la base de datos y los plugins. Durante esta sesión os mostraremos claves de los procesos de actualización que junto con los casos reales de Carrefour y la sesión posterior, te harán decidirte a cambiar a la última versión.
En el caso de Carrefour se explicará como Liferay ha ayudado al área de RRHH a ofrecer una experiencia digital omnicanal e integral a sus empleados, unificando el acceso a los procesos de recursos humanos; evaluación del desempeño anual, planes de acción, gamificación, acceso a información personal como el recibo de nómina o el certificado de retenciones; trabajo en equipo gracias a los Sites de Comunidades; celebración de eventos a nivel Compañía compartiendo fotos y vídeos, además de difundir las noticias del Grupo.
Actualizar a DXP permite, además, mejorar la experiencia de usuarios y gestores de contenidos gracias al diseño Lexicon, mejor integración de la parte Social Office en la plataforma y reducir los requisitos de infraestructura gracias a la modularidad.

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Rafa ha estado trabajando como un consultor de Liferay desde mayo de 2016. Sus principales actividades son preventa de producto, formador oficial en Liferay y prestación de servicios profesionales a los clientes. Anteriormente ha trabajado en una consultora dónde participaba en todas las diferentes fases del IT: desarrollo, análisis, gestión de proyecto y preventa; todo especializado en aplicaciones web o CMS. Rafa está graduado en Ingeniería de Software en la Universidad de Nebrija.</Description></root>

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">En esta charla hablaríamos de Ingeniería de Liferay, como ha evolucionado y ha ido creciendo gracias a nuestros productos open source. 
Nuestro afán por hacer productos mejores nos lleva a ser una organización que cree en la mejora continua. El desarrollo de los productos se realiza desde diversas partes del mundo, distintas zonas horarias, equipos distribuidos y una gran comunidad, por tanto,  hemos tenido que evolucionar y madurar según íbamos creciendo. Durante este proceso y camino, hemos ido recogiendo experiencias, éxitos y porque no decirlo de errores,  de ellas hemos aprendido una serie de lecciones a aplicar en cualquier proyecto de desarrollo de software.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
En esta charla hablaríamos de Ingeniería de Liferay, como ha evolucionado y ha ido creciendo gracias a nuestros productos open source. 
Nuestro afán por hacer productos mejores nos lleva a ser una organización que cree en la mejora continua. El desarrollo de los productos se realiza desde diversas partes del mundo, distintas zonas horarias, equipos distribuidos y una gran comunidad, por tanto,  hemos tenido que evolucionar y madurar según íbamos creciendo. Durante este proceso y camino, hemos ido recogiendo experiencias, éxitos y porque no decirlo de errores,  de ellas hemos aprendido una serie de lecciones a aplicar en cualquier proyecto de desarrollo de software.

Con más de 10 años de experiencia internacional, ha dedicado su carrera profesional a la gestión de proyectos de software. Defensora de metodologías y herramientas ágiles, su principal objetivo es a ayudar a los equipos a crecer, mejorar y facilitar el desarrollo de producto.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Antonio se unió recientemente al equipo de Liferay en Madrid como Product Manager, ayudando a evolucionar la estrategia de todo nuestro producto con especial atención a todo lo relacionado con colaboración. sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">How many hours does you and your team spend configuring Liferay DXP or Liferay Portal? What do you do when there are thousands of people accessing your application at the same time? How do you scale it properly? How much money does your company spend with all this DevOps work? In this talk, you'll see how WeDeploy can speed up development of Liferay projects, minimize costs of infrastructure, and help you build the next generation of apps.</Description></root>

In this talk, you'll see how WeDeploy can speed up development of Liferay projects, minimize costs of infrastructure, and help you build the next generation of apps.

summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Summary language-id="en_US">Unter dem aktuellen Motto „<strong>TOGETHER RELOADED: Wie IT und Business die digitale Transformation gemeinsam meistern</strong>” laden wir ein Jahr nach der Markteinführung der Liferay Digital Experience Platform (DXP) Interessenten, Kunden und Partner aus <strong>Deutschland</strong>, <strong>Österreich</strong> und der <strong>Schweiz</strong> herzlich zum <a href="https://www.liferay.com/web/events-ldsf-dach/home">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF)</a> ein.&nbsp;<br />
&nbsp;<br />
Das LDSF im Überblick:
<ul>
	<li>Umfangreicher Erfahrungsaustausch mit Liferay Experten, Kunden und Partnern</li>
	<li>Vorträge, Ausstellung und verschiedene Networking-Formate an einem Ort vereint</li>
	<li>Mehr als 40 Sessions rund um Liferay DXP, digitale Trends und Strategien, IT Operations und eine optimierte Customer Experience</li>
	<li>„Liferay DXP zum Anfassen” in zahlreichen Live-Demos</li>
	<li>Keynotes von Liferay Executives und Praxisvorträge der Liferay Kunden</li>
	<li>Intensiver Wissensaustausch in Expert Exchanges und einem Barcamp</li>
	<li>Welcome Reception und exklusiver Zugang zur historischen Fahrzeughalle der BMW Group Classic</li>
</ul>

<p>Melden Sie sich am besten noch heute mit Frühbucherrabatt an!</p></Summary></root>

summaryCurrentValue:
Unter dem aktuellen Motto „TOGETHER RELOADED: Wie IT und Business die digitale Transformation gemeinsam meistern” laden wir ein Jahr nach der Markteinführung der Liferay Digital Experience Platform (DXP) Interessenten, Kunden und Partner aus Deutschland, Österreich und der Schweiz herzlich zum Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF) ein. 
 
Das LDSF im Überblick:
  • Umfangreicher Erfahrungsaustausch mit Liferay Experten, Kunden und Partnern
  • Vorträge, Ausstellung und verschiedene Networking-Formate an einem Ort vereint
  • Mehr als 40 Sessions rund um Liferay DXP, digitale Trends und Strategien, IT Operations und eine optimierte Customer Experience

  • Keynotes von Liferay Executives und Praxisvorträge der Liferay Kunden
  • Intensiver Wissensaustausch in Expert Exchanges und einem Barcamp
  • Welcome Reception und exklusiver Zugang zur historischen Fahrzeughalle der BMW Group Classic

Melden Sie sich am besten noch heute mit Frühbucherrabatt an!

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">mitarbeitervorteile.de, ein Unternehmen des Degussa Bank Konzerns, ist das Vorteilsportal für Mitarbeiter und gehört zu den Marktführern in Deutschland. Ziel ist es mit dem Portal den Unternehmen digitale Mehrwerte und Services für ihre Mitarbeiter und Stakeholder zu bieten. Liferay DXP bildet hierfür die optimale, zukunftsfähige Plattform, die unternehmensindividuelle Lösungen im Rahmen der Umsetzung von Industrie 4.0 ermöglicht. Dabei finden Liferay DXP Funktionen/Features Anwendung. Insbesondere handelt es sich dabei um die detaillierte Benutzer- und Berechtigungsverwaltung, das umfangreiche Content- und Asset Management sowie die beeindruckenden Möglichkeiten des Elastic Suchindex in Kombination mit Audience Targeting und SEO Funktionalitäten. Der Vortrag vermittelt einen Eindruck wie Bausteine von Liferay DXP für das Erreichen der betriebswirtschaftlichen Ziele genutzt werden.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Teilnehmer des letztjährigen LDSF hatten bereits Gelegenheit sich über diesen Fachvortrag der Thematik der Microservices anzunähern. Während die Versprechen der strikten Modularität groß sind, kann eine solche Architektur gerade für kleinere Projekte schnell zum Komplexitätstreiber werden. Eine Alternative können hier In-Process-Microservices darstellen, bei deren Betrieb Sie Liferay unterstützen kann.</Description></root>

assetCategoriesJSONArray.name: Experts Exchange

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Sie planen ein Upgrade Ihrer Liferay-Plattform auf Liferay DXP? Und erwarten vorab konkrete Aussagen und Erfahrungswerte, wie der Wechsel auf Liferay DXP erfolgreich wird und mit welchen Aufwänden zu rechnen ist? 
Wir zeigen, wie Sie sicherstellen, dass Ihr Upgrade-Projekt kalkulierbar wird – im Budget und in der Umsetzungszeit. Und diskutieren mit Ihnen die wichtigsten Fragestellungen:
<ul> <li> Wie kann ich die Komplexität, Risiken und Kosten meines Upgrade-Projektes realistisch einschätzen?</li> 
 <li> Weshalb ist es vor dem Start sinnvoll, die Aspekte – Website und Content, Theming, Benutzerverwaltung, Portlets/Applikationen und Liferay Erweiterungen (wie Hooks, Ext-Plugin) – zu bewerten?
</li> 
 <li> Wie gehe ich beim Upgrade vor? Welche Schritte führen zum gewünschten Erfolg?</li> </ul>
Sie wollen direkt am LDSF einen Schnell-Check Ihres Upgrade-Projektes vornehmen? Machen Sie den Test mit der edicos-Erstanalyse-App.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
Sie planen ein Upgrade Ihrer Liferay-Plattform auf Liferay DXP? Und erwarten vorab konkrete Aussagen und Erfahrungswerte, wie der Wechsel auf Liferay DXP erfolgreich wird und mit welchen Aufwänden zu rechnen ist? Wir zeigen, wie Sie sicherstellen, dass Ihr Upgrade-Projekt kalkulierbar wird – im Budget und in der Umsetzungszeit. Und diskutieren mit Ihnen die wichtigsten Fragestellungen:
  • Wie kann ich die Komplexität, Risiken und Kosten meines Upgrade-Projektes realistisch einschätzen?
  • Weshalb ist es vor dem Start sinnvoll, die Aspekte – Website und Content, Theming, Benutzerverwaltung, Portlets/Applikationen und Liferay Erweiterungen (wie Hooks, Ext-Plugin) – zu bewerten?
  • Wie gehe ich beim Upgrade vor? Welche Schritte führen zum gewünschten Erfolg?
Sie wollen direkt am LDSF einen Schnell-Check Ihres Upgrade-Projektes vornehmen? Machen Sie den Test mit der edicos-Erstanalyse-App.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Unter den vielen Funktionalitäten, die Liferay zur Verfügung stellt, ist eine das Content Management System. Dieses besitzt neben den offensichtlichen Funktionen auch viele, die nicht so offensichtlich sind. Dieser Vortrag wirft ein Licht auf die Chancen und Möglichkeiten des eingebauten CMS sowie der Integration eines externen Systems.</Description></root>

Dieser Vortrag wirft ein Licht auf die Chancen und Möglichkeiten des eingebauten CMS sowie der Integration eines externen Systems.

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Olaf Kock war zunächst zwei Jahre lang aktives Mitglied der Liferay Community, bevor er in 2010 Technical Consultant und Trainer des Unternehmens wurde. Zur Zeit überarbeitet er die Liferay Trainingsangebote in Europa und gibt in den von ihm moderierten "Radio Liferay" Podcasts Einblicke hinter die Kulissen von Liferay.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Die Unterstützung von Mobilgeräten mittels responsiver Webseiten ist heute Standard. Sollen jedoch „echte“ Geschäftsprozesse mobil abgebildet werden, ist in der Regel eine tiefere Integration mit dem Mobilgerät in Form einer App erforderlich. Dazu liefert Liferay Bausteine, die Funktionen und Daten des Portals wie z.B. Dokumente, Content, Formulare oder soziale Funktionen auch in Apps zur Verfügung stellen. Ihre Nutzer profitieren so von einem nahtlosen mobilen Erlebnis und Ihre Mobil-Entwickler von hoher Produktivität. In diesem Vortrag zeigen wir Ihnen an einem konkreten Beispiel die Vorteile, aber auch die Grenzen von Liferay Screens und Liferay SDK.</Description></root>

Sollen jedoch „echte“ Geschäftsprozesse mobil abgebildet werden, ist in der Regel eine tiefere Integration mit dem Mobilgerät in Form einer App erforderlich. Dazu liefert Liferay Bausteine, die Funktionen und Daten des Portals wie z.B. Dokumente, Content, Formulare oder soziale Funktionen auch in Apps zur Verfügung stellen. Ihre Nutzer profitieren so von einem nahtlosen mobilen Erlebnis und Ihre Mobil-Entwickler von hoher Produktivität. In diesem Vortrag zeigen wir Ihnen an einem konkreten Beispiel die Vorteile, aber auch die Grenzen von Liferay Screens und Liferay SDK.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Liferay bringt viele Features als Standard mit. Zusätzlich gibt es auf dem offenen Markt eine Vielzahl von Software Produkten, die in Liferay integriert werden können. In dieser Runde möchten wir gemeinsam über komplementäre Produkte sprechen, mit der Sie Ihre Lösung anreichern können und für die zur Zeit von Liferay noch keine Integration vorgedacht ist. Wir freuen uns auf interessante Ideen und eine lebhafte Diskussion.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Digitale Plattformen sind zunehmend geschäftskritisch. Entsprechend hoch sind die Anforderungen an Stabilität, Performance und Verfügbarkeit – nicht nur der Basissoftware, sondern des Gesamtsystems. Fachabteilungen legen aus diesem Grund immer mehr Wert auf einen Betrieb, der sich an der Business-Perspektive orientiert. Traditionelle, auf reinen Systembetrieb ausgerichtete IT-Organisationen geraten hier oft an ihre Grenzen. In diesem Expert Exchange diskutieren wir verschiedene Betriebsoptionen – vom vollständigen Eigenbetrieb über externes Application Management bis zur kompletten Software-as-a-Service-Lösung.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: Digitale Plattformen sind zunehmend geschäftskritisch. Entsprechend hoch sind die Anforderungen an Stabilität, Performance und Verfügbarkeit – nicht nur der Basissoftware, sondern des Gesamtsystems. Fachabteilungen legen aus diesem Grund immer mehr Wert auf einen Betrieb, der sich an der Business-Perspektive orientiert. Traditionelle, auf reinen Systembetrieb ausgerichtete IT-Organisationen geraten hier oft an ihre Grenzen. In diesem Expert Exchange diskutieren wir verschiedene Betriebsoptionen – vom vollständigen Eigenbetrieb über externes Application Management bis zur kompletten Software-as-a-Service-Lösung.

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Anhand des von uns entwickelten „Liferay DXP Readiness Check“ erörtern wir gemeinsam mit Ihnen, wie Sie den Umstieg auf die neue Liferay Digital Experience Plattform (DXP) optimal planen und durchführen können. <ul>
<li> Zeitliche Planung eines Liferay DXP Upgrades. Wie bestimme ich das optimale Timing, was sind die Vorteile eines frühzeitigen Upgrades?</li>
<li>Wie kann ich Fehler und Probleme vergangener Upgrades vermeiden?</li>
<li>Wo stehe ich mit meinen Systemen und wie bereite ich sie optimal auf das Upgrade vor?</li>
<li> Vorstellung des mimacom Upgrade-Pfads, eine sichere Upgrade-Methodik für Liferay DXP</li>
<li>Bestimmung Ihrer Anforderungen an eine digitale Plattform und Abgleich mit den Liferay DXP Benefits</li></ul></Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
Anhand des von uns entwickelten „Liferay DXP Readiness Check“ erörtern wir gemeinsam mit Ihnen, wie Sie den Umstieg auf die neue Liferay Digital Experience Plattform (DXP) optimal planen und durchführen können.
  • Zeitliche Planung eines Liferay DXP Upgrades. Wie bestimme ich das optimale Timing, was sind die Vorteile eines frühzeitigen Upgrades?
  • Wie kann ich Fehler und Probleme vergangener Upgrades vermeiden?
  • Wo stehe ich mit meinen Systemen und wie bereite ich sie optimal auf das Upgrade vor?
  • Vorstellung des mimacom Upgrade-Pfads, eine sichere Upgrade-Methodik für Liferay DXP
  • Bestimmung Ihrer Anforderungen an eine digitale Plattform und Abgleich mit den Liferay DXP Benefits

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">mitarbeitervorteile.de, ein Unternehmen des Degussa Bank Konzerns, ist das Vorteilsportal für Mitarbeiter und gehört  zu den Marktführern in Deutschland. Zusammen mit PRODYNA wurde nach einer Alternative zur alten PHP-basierten CMS-Lösung gesucht, auf dessen Basis die angestrebten Ziele der Digitalisierung zukünftig weiter vorangetrieben werden können. Der Vortrag gibt einen Einblick in die Bausteine und Funktionen, die Liferay DXP zu einem optimalen Kandidaten für diese Herausforderung machen. Des Weiteren werden Anregungen zur Verwendung in Liferay DXP Projekten präsentiert.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Über den Erfolg Ihres Digitalisierungsvorhabens entscheidet nicht nur die Kommunikation mit Ihren Zielgruppen, sondern auch die nahtlose Anbindung an und die Automatisierung von internen Geschäftsprozessen. Hier ergeben sich oft anfänglich nur schwer erkennbare Stolpersteine, z.B. bei der Anbindung zentraler Daten oder wichtiger Teil- und Unterstützungsprozesse. In diesem Expert Exchange diskutieren wir, wie Sie diese Stolpersteine frühzeitig erkennen und effektiv vermeiden.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Die Architektur von Liferay DXP unterscheidet sich grundlegend von der Architektur der Version 6.2. Um diesem Umstand Rechnung zu tragen, hat Liferay Werkzeuge und Best Practices zusammengestellt, die ein Upgrade möglichst einfach machen. assetCategoriesJSONArray.name: Experts Exchange

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Unternehmen und deren IT-Abteilungen stehen vor der Herausforderung, ihre Geschäftsmodelle für das digitale Zeitalter anpassen zu müssen. Die Digitalisierung ist somit Chance und Risiko zugleich, bei der stets die Kundenbeziehung im Mittelpunkt stehen sollte. In dieser Expert Exchange Session diskutieren wir, wie Sie sich in diesen Zeiten des Wandels weiterhin erfolgreich am Markt positionieren und von der Konkurrenz differenzieren können. Angesprochen werden unter anderem die vielfältigen Möglichkeiten der Digitalisierung und wie digitale Nähe zu den Kunden erreicht werden kann. Die zu bewältigenden Herausforderungen wie "time to market" und vertikale Integration werden ebenfalls thematisiert.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: Unternehmen und deren IT-Abteilungen stehen vor der Herausforderung, ihre Geschäftsmodelle für das digitale Zeitalter anpassen zu müssen. Die Digitalisierung ist somit Chance und Risiko zugleich, bei der stets die Kundenbeziehung im Mittelpunkt stehen sollte. In dieser Expert Exchange Session diskutieren wir, wie Sie sich in diesen Zeiten des Wandels weiterhin erfolgreich am Markt positionieren und von der Konkurrenz differenzieren können. Angesprochen werden unter anderem die vielfältigen Möglichkeiten der Digitalisierung und wie digitale Nähe zu den Kunden erreicht werden kann. Die zu bewältigenden Herausforderungen wie "time to market" und vertikale Integration werden ebenfalls thematisiert.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Liferay verbindet Content, Prozesse und Interaktion zu einem nahtlosen Online-Erlebnis. Damit Sie Ihre Zielgruppen schnell und effizient erreichen, bringt Liferay eine Vielzahl von häufig benötigten Funktionen und Modulen wie z.B. CMS, DMS oder eine leistungsfähige Suche bereits mit. Darüber hinaus existieren viele Konzepte „unter der Haube“, wie z.B. Liferay Assets, die auch in Individualentwicklungen genutzt werden können. In diesem Expert Exchange diskutieren wir die Vorteile und Chancen, aber auch die zu beachtenden Randbedingungen und Grenzen beim Einsatz dieser Bausteine.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Die Bedeutung von Standards für die Interoperabilität von Plattformen gewinnt im Zuge der Digitalisierung immer mehr an Bedeutung. Damit Unternehmen für zukünftige Anforderungen vorbereitet sind, sind flexibel erweiterbare Plattformen, die auf Standards basieren, wichtige Voraussetzung. In diesem Vortrag erhalten Sie ein Update zu Liferay Spezifikationen 2017 und Sie erfahren bei welchen Standards Liferay sich engagiert.</Description></root>

summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US," default-locale="en_US"><Summary language-id="en_US"><p style="color: rgb(80, 0, 80); font-family: arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12.8px; margin-bottom: 1em;">
<style type="text/css">p.p1 {margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px; font: 12.0px Helvetica}
</style>
</p>

<p class="p1">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF) is the annual event for anyone involved in (or looking at)&nbsp;Liferay. It's the best time to hear company's digital transformation stories first hand, to discuss your latest business challenges and connect with the enterprise develpment community. This year LDSF 2017 will be packed with new content including:</p>

<ul>
	<li class="p1">Keynotes from <strong>HP Enterprise</strong>&nbsp;and <strong>Forrester</strong>.</li>
	<li class="p1">Public and private sector case studies including&nbsp;<strong>Degussa Bank</strong>, <strong>Knowledge Hub&nbsp;</strong></li>
	<li class="p1">Expert Panels on <strong>GDPR for customer data</strong>, <strong>Transforming financial services CX</strong>&nbsp;and <strong>DevOps and speed&nbsp;with legacy</strong>.</li>
	<li class="p1">Roundtables on <strong>mobile</strong>, <strong>customer experience design</strong>, <strong>content management strategies</strong>, <strong>GDPR with Liferay</strong>.</li>
	<li class="p1">Technical sessions on <strong>Docker</strong> deployment, <strong>automated test CI/CD&nbsp;</strong>and <strong>headless CMS for AR / VR</strong>.</li>
	<li class="p1">The latest on <strong>Liferay's strategy</strong> and <strong>product roadmap</strong></li>
</ul>

<p class="p1">&nbsp;</p></Summary></root>

modelAttributes.title: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Title language-id="en_US">Liferay Digital Solutions Forum UK</Title></root>

summaryCurrentValue:
Liferay Digital Solutions Forum (LDSF) is the annual event for anyone involved in (or looking at) Liferay. It's the best time to hear company's digital transformation stories first hand, to discuss your latest business challenges and connect with the enterprise develpment community. This year LDSF 2017 will be packed with new content including:

  • Keynotes from HP Enterprise and Forrester.
  • Public and private sector case studies including Degussa Bank, Knowledge Hub 
  • Expert Panels on GDPR for customer data, Transforming financial services CX and DevOps and speed with legacy.
  • Roundtables on mobile, customer experience design, content management strategies, GDPR with Liferay.
  • Technical sessions on Docker deployment, automated test CI/CD and headless CMS for AR / VR.
  • The latest on Liferay's strategy and product roadmap

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) refocuses data management on the protection of EU citizen’s personal data. This introduces new challenges, but also opportunities for organisations to consider how they use personal data and maintain trusting relationships with users of digital services.<br/><br/>

This panel, brings together authorities in data management, cyber security, digital design with public and private sector service providers to discuss the practicalities of meeting the legal and ethical obligation of GDPR.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) refocuses data management on the protection of EU citizen’s personal data. This introduces new challenges, but also opportunities for organisations to consider how they use personal data and maintain trusting relationships with users of digital services.

This panel, brings together authorities in data management, cyber security, digital design with public and private sector service providers to discuss the practicalities of meeting the legal and ethical obligation of GDPR.

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Learn how you can enrich your content by applying and managing metadata within a Liferay environment. We will take you through automatic and semi-automatic processes that save time whilst ensuring quality. 
The session will cover how this metadata can be applied for improved search and discoverability of content, traversing content and data silos, and capturing valuable domain knowledge for reuse in different business scenarios.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
Learn how you can enrich your content by applying and managing metadata within a Liferay environment. We will take you through automatic and semi-automatic processes that save time whilst ensuring quality. 
The session will cover how this metadata can be applied for improved search and discoverability of content, traversing content and data silos, and capturing valuable domain knowledge for reuse in different business scenarios.

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Employee benefits business www.mitarbeitervorteile.de is a subsidiary of Degussa Bank and is one of the market leaders in Germany. The comprehensive self-service platform helps employers to improve employee loyalty and satisfaction through incentives, services and communications. Faced with an ageing PHP-based CMS, the company sought a platform with more flexibility for its future digital transformation plans.

In this round table, Rene will provide an insight into the building blocks and functions that made Liferay DXP an ideal candidate for this challenge, and share some additional use cases where Prodyna has found this platform approach deliver the most value.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
Employee benefits business www.mitarbeitervorteile.de is a subsidiary of Degussa Bank and is one of the market leaders in Germany. In this round table, Rene will provide an insight into the building blocks and functions that made Liferay DXP an ideal candidate for this challenge, and share some additional use cases where Prodyna has found this platform approach deliver the most value.

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">How do you enable business tools and processes for 170,000 channel partner organizations in 174 countries?  How do you interact with over 650,000 individuals across the globe operating in multiple languages and diverse business environments, while still ensuring each has a relevant, targeted experience? These are some of the challenges we have faced at Hewlett-Packard Enterprise (HPE).  Our digital partner transformation began in 2014 with the delivery of a dynamic global channel partner portal that was able to meet these challenges. Our continued evolution now includes new mobile partner enablement solutions to engage our partners 24x7 and help them to drive their business on-the-go.

This presentation will explain the HPE transformation journey, our take on the key enablers and decision points, outline the latest developments and share suggested approaches.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
How do you enable business tools and processes for 170,000 channel partner organizations in 174 countries?  How do you interact with over 650,000 individuals across the globe operating in multiple languages and diverse business environments, while still ensuring each has a relevant, targeted experience? These are some of the challenges we have faced at Hewlett-Packard Enterprise (HPE).  Our digital partner transformation began in 2014 with the delivery of a dynamic global channel partner portal that was able to meet these challenges. Our continued evolution now includes new mobile partner enablement solutions to engage our partners 24x7 and help them to drive their business on-the-go.

This presentation will explain the HPE transformation journey, our take on the key enablers and decision points, outline the latest developments and share suggested approaches.

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Anne oversees the end-to-end HPE partner experience, driving a closed-loop partner feedback engine to continuously enhance operational business tools and processes and a stable and effective partner ecosystem.  Her global responsibilities also include onboarding of all new HPE partners, the HPE Partner Ready Portal and platform, and the HPE Go mobile app.</Description></root>

sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">What technologies does the financial services industry need in its arsenal to transform? Banking and payment ecosystems are building from digital partnerships, new ventures driven by customer expectations. Insurtech startups are muscling in on customer relationships with new digital experiences and propositions.<br /><br />
This panel will discuss the key technology pillars FSI businesses need as a foundation to transform customer experiences - from the delivery of digital experiences to personalisation, analytics to addressing legacy challenges and the API economy.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
What technologies does the financial services industry need in its arsenal to transform? Banking and payment ecosystems are building from digital partnerships, new ventures driven by customer expectations. Insurtech startups are muscling in on customer relationships with new digital experiences and propositions.

This panel will discuss the key technology pillars FSI businesses need as a foundation to transform customer experiences - from the delivery of digital experiences to personalisation, analytics to addressing legacy challenges and the API economy.

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">DevOps means many things to many people, but delivering software value faster is a priority for every organisation. Developers are driving change from the factory floor with continuous delivery; leading organisations are fostering collaboration from the board, but legacy issues remain a very real challenge for established enterprises. <br /><br />
This panel will focus on strategies for overcoming legacy issues to accelerate digital innovation and collaboration within the business with real world examples.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue:
DevOps means many things to many people, but delivering software value faster is a priority for every organisation. Developers are driving change from the factory floor with continuous delivery; leading organisations are fostering collaboration from the board, but legacy issues remain a very real challenge for established enterprises.

This panel will focus on strategies for overcoming legacy issues to accelerate digital innovation and collaboration within the business with real world examples.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">NoSQL, Serverless, DevOps, Social Auth, ... Developers these days want to forget about infrastructure and simply build great scalable apps quickly. This just got easier and I'll prove it to you by live coding an application that you can interact with during the talk (bring your laptop and/or smartphone). While having fun playing with what I code, you'll learn how to easily build any web application - from simple SPAs trough a full micro-service architecture to complex enterprise applications.</Description></root>

While having fun playing with what I code, you'll learn how to easily build any web application - from simple SPAs trough a full micro-service architecture to complex enterprise applications.

He is passionate about designing and building software as well as helping others design and build good software! For over 15 years in the industry he has developed, designed or consulted on various Java EE solutions for leading European companies (mostly in the finance and telecommunications industry).</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">At LDSF 2016 Firelay presented what we wanted to do with Docker in the future. Now, we have turned ‘want’ into ‘can’. Firelay delivers Docker in production since the 1st of September 2017. This year Simon will tell you all about our lessons learned from using Docker for local development with Eclipse and bringing it all to production on Kubernetes.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: At LDSF 2016 Firelay presented what we wanted to do with Docker in the future. Now, we have turned ‘want’ into ‘can’. Firelay delivers Docker in production since the 1st of September 2017. This year Simon will tell you all about our lessons learned from using Docker for local development with Eclipse and bringing it all to production on Kubernetes.

He has worked for Firelay since 2013 and has been exploring innovative technologies ever since. Currently, he specialises in continuous integration. Simon is a familiar face on Liferay conferences and had his fair share of on stage speaker time.</Description></root>

summary:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US,it_IT," default-locale="en_US"><Summary language-id="en_US"><p><strong>Discover fresh insights into customer experience from experts who are leading the way.</strong></p>

<p>Customer-centric business is here to stay. How do you address the challenges of creating a unified experience that connects every digital touchpoint? At Liferay Symposium, you'll learn how industry leaders are using a customer-first approach to transform their business. Sessions will focus on digital disruption and strategy, analytics, omnichannel technology, integration, and more. Be the first to see product updates and roadmaps, connect with Liferay chiefs and senior consultants, and learn from the experiences of key clients and partners.</p></Summary><Summary language-id="it_IT"><p><strong>Scopri le novitá relative alla customer Experience direttamente dai leader.</strong></p>

<p>Il business Customer centrico è arrivato per restare. Come affrontare le sfide per creare un'esperienza unica che collega ogni punto di contatto del mondo digitale? Al Liferay Symposium, scoprirai come i leader del settore stanno trasformando il proprio business mettendo al centro di tutto il Cliente. Le sessioni saranno incentrate sulle strategie digitali e la digital disruption, l'analisi, la tecnologia omnichannel, le integrazioni e su molti altri temi di attualitá. Il Liferay Symposium ti permette di essere il primo a vedere gli aggiornamenti di prodotto e le roadmap, di incontrare i manager e gli esperti consulenti Liferay, di conoscere ed imparare dalle esperienze dei clienti e dei partner.</p></Summary></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Bryan Cheung steers the company's strategic direction and worldwide business development efforts as one of the founders serving with the company since its inception in 2004. Drawing on his technical experience, understanding of customer needs, and a passion for end users, Bryan leads Liferay in meeting its commitment to deliver focused and effective business solutions to its customers and its community. Bryan graduated from the University of California, Berkeley with a degree in Computer Science, and is a sought-after keynote speaker at major IT and open source industry events.</Description></root>
marketingEventUsers.descriptionCurrentValue: Bryan Cheung steers the company's strategic direction and worldwide business development efforts as one of the founders serving with the company since its inception in 2004. Drawing on his technical experience, understanding of customer needs, and a passion for end users, Bryan leads Liferay in meeting its commitment to deliver focused and effective business solutions to its customers and its community. Bryan graduated from the University of California, Berkeley with a degree in Computer Science, and is a sought-after keynote speaker at major IT and open source industry events.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Liferay è stato usato con successo sia in portali customer che in siti marketing. Questa sessione mostrerà come implementare la soluzione commerce di prossima generazione che completerà l'esperienza cliente in una singola, unica piattaforma. Vi mostreremo come la convergenza tra le aspettative B2B e B2C può essere soddisfatta usando Liferay DXP.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Javier Gamarra is the Senior Software Engineer in Liferay Screens and Mobile development. In his spare time, he organizes events and courses in CyLicon Valley, a local meetup and in AgileSpain, the spanish agile methodology association, where he is a board member.</Description></root>

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">In questa sessione spiegheremo perchè avere una Customer Experience Unificata è fondamentale per coinvolgere i clienti, e soprattutto come la tecnologia Web e Mobile di Liferay DXP puó aiutare a costruirla.
Mostreremo in dettaglio come la suite mobile di Liferay é stata potenziata rispetto alle precedenti versioni per permettere di dare una risposta a questo tema sia dal punto di vista business che tecnico, presentando una demo che ne illustra i diversi aspetti.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Matteo Mangiacavalli è Account Manager in Liferay. L'ingresso nel mondo del lavoro nel 1993, lo vede subito attivo nel mondo delle reti informatiche, prima con le BBS per poi approdare come socio in Galactica, primo Internet Service provider commerciale d'Italia. Le esperienze come sviluppatore, Project manager e Account lo portano a stretto contatto con la piattaforma Liferay, prima come System Integrator e oggi come Account Manager per il mercato italiano.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">NoSQL, Serverless, DevOps, Social Auth, ... Developers these days want to forget about infrastructure and simply build great scalable apps quickly. This just got easier and I'll prove it to you by live coding an application that you can interact with during the talk (bring your laptop and/or smartphone). While having fun playing with what I code, you'll learn how to easily build any web application - from simple SPAs trough a full micro-service architecture to complex enterprise applications.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Milen is a Developer Advocate at Liferay and focuses on Java and OSGi Platform. He is passionate about designing and building software as well as helping others design and build good software! After more than 15 years developing, designing and consulting on various Java EE solutions for leading European companies, he currently spends most of his time teaching, speaking at conferences all over the world and researching his favorite topics around Java modularity, systems architecture and software craftsmanship.</Description></root>

Digital e consumer marketing stanno ispirando nuove modalità di fare recruiting, lavorare, formare e coinvolgere i dipendenti:  i manager HR iniziano ad applicare sempre di più un approccio consumer oriented verso i propri dipendenti. Negli ultimi 10 anni si è specializzato nell’utilizzo di Liferay, con particolare interesse per le integrazioni dei plugin custom e altre personalizzazioni del core a partire dalla versione 5.1 di Liferay fino alla DXP.  E’ team Leader del Liferay Competence Center di Ariadne e ha seguito in qualità di Project Manager progetti per grandi clienti come (Banco BPM, London Stock Exchange, Sisal, Banco do Brasil, GiGroup, ecc).</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">In questa sessione verrà presentata l’evoluzione della piattaforma per la gestione dei device integrando i dati con le tipiche funzionalità social e collaborative di Liferay; oltre a vedere come è stata realizzata la piattaforma ci focalizzeremo sulla gestione del dato dal punto di vista della analisi e della presentazione. Ci baseremo su un case di una multinazionale che ha adottato Liferay come IoT experience nella gestione dei prodotti finiti e delle linee di produzione.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Nel 2005 inizia la sua carriera nel mondo IT, si appassiona presto al coding specializzandosi principalmente sulla piattaforma J2EE. Negli anni contribuisce alla realizzazione di numerose soluzioni informatiche, in diversi ambiti e per diverse realtà aziendali. 
Nel 2011 Davide incontra Liferay grazie alla collaborazione in un progetto per le Nazione Unite, da allora intraprende un percorso di specializzazione su Liferay che lo porta all'incontro con SMC, dove da tre anni svolge il ruolo di Senior Liferay Developer e Team Leader.</Description></root>

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">App4Health è una startup che nasce dall’esperienza di Vivisol, azienda italiana leader nel settore
home care, con 30 anni di esperienza in 15 diversi paesi. La soluzione tecnologica è centrale per
una startup che ha l’obiettivo di portare un modello di business innovativo nel mondo della sanità
digitale. App4Health è “la rete per la tua salute” , una piattaforma che offre approfondimenti
tematici e prenotazioni di visite specialistiche, integrata ad un eshop di prodotti e servizi.
La scelta di Liferay ha consentito di realizzare una soluzione che supportasse l’avvio di un nuovo
business senza appesantirlo, ma sostenendone in modo modulare lo sviluppo. L’obiettivo era la
creazione di un percorso di salute omnicanale dedicato alle persone, con il coinvolgimento di
farmacie territoriali e centri polispecialistici privati. Con Noovle è stata realizzata una soluzione che
permettesse di guidare l’utente in ogni momento, attraverso un’architettura integrata facilmente
accessibile e utilizzabile.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Ci sono svariati problemi che il machine learning può risolvere. Alcuni di questi sono abbastanza generici e possono essere gestiti grazie alle emergenti tecnologie di servizi esterni come AWS Lex, ML, Rekognition, che si integrano facilmente in Liferay. Altri sono più verticali. Per esempio, gestire il magazzino in real time è fondamentale per la redditività di un e-commerce. Noi proponiamo l’applicazione di una tecnologia chiamata “Deep reinforcement learning”, in genere impiegata nell’associazione tra gaming e robotica. Questa tecnologia è in grado di risolvere degli specifici problemi in ambito e-commerce permettendo ai buyers di operare tramite una consolle su Liferay e prendere le giuste decisioni di acquisto in real time, potenzialmente consentendo alle macchine di essere autonome in futuro in questo processo.</Description></root>

Altri sono più verticali. Per esempio, gestire il magazzino in real time è fondamentale per la redditività di un e-commerce. Noi proponiamo l’applicazione di una tecnologia chiamata “Deep reinforcement learning”, in genere impiegata nell’associazione tra gaming e robotica. Questa tecnologia è in grado di risolvere degli specifici problemi in ambito e-commerce permettendo ai buyers di operare tramite una consolle su Liferay e prendere le giuste decisioni di acquisto in real time, potenzialmente consentendo alle macchine di essere autonome in futuro in questo processo.

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Dopo la laurea in Ingegneria Elettronica all'Università di Pavia, inizia da subito a sviluppare per il web e nel 1995 fonda, insieme al socio Ricotti, Ariadne, società di web engineering focalizzata sullo sviluppo di piattaforme digitali con approccio basato su metodologie di sviluppo software lean-agile. In pochi anni la società cresce e diventa leader di mercato vantando referenze di prestigio a livello europeo e un team di più di 50 persone. Si interessa di vari argomenti legati alle architetture ICT e approfondisce le problematiche di sicurezza con una successiva laurea in Sicurezza dei Sistemi e delle Reti presso l’Università di Milano. Sempre curioso e informato sui temi dell'innovazione tecnologica, Torriani si divide tra il lavoro, la famiglia e l'altra sua grande passione: la fotografia.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Marco Piastra ha più di 25 anni di esperienza internazionale nel settore come Digital Strategy Advisor, Solutions Architect e Project Manager. Si è occupato di progetti innovativi per grandi organizzazioni pubbliche e private nell’industria hi-tech, in ambito bancario e dell’ e-government. Docente di Artificial Intelligence presso il Dipartimento di Ingegneria Industriale e dell'Informazione dell'Università di Pavia dal 2004. Membro del Consiglio Italiano per gli Ingegneri Professionali dal 1997. Membro IEEE dal 1998. Specializzazioni: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Software Product Strategy, Technical Project Leadership and Management, Algorithmics, Integrated Service Design, Technical Architecture, e-Government, User Experience Strategy.</Description></root>

sessions.description:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">L’integrazione Lifeary e OnlyOffice per l’enterprise collaboration (Enrico Bortolan, Domenico Costa)
In questa sessione verrà presentata una soluzione di enterprise collaboration basata sulle piattaforme Liferay DXP e Liferay 7 che integra una soluzione di web editing online, già disponibile sia in modalità "software as a services" che "on premises". Mostreremo i metodi di integrazione e come si sono valorizzate le social capabilities di Liferay in uno scenario collaborativo. La presentazione si baserà su case significativi.</Description></root>

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">In SMC fin dal 1999, Enrico si è occupato di soluzioni gestionali, maturando una forte esperienza nell’ambito delle aziende di distribuzione. sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">We usually consider an upgrade process as a time-consuming and complex task. In this talk, based on the experience gained during this year, we will check those elements and recommendations which can change that perspective. We will review solutions for common problems and techniques to determine their root causes and minimize their impact. We also show new tools and tips to speed up the process.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: We usually consider an upgrade process as a time-consuming and complex task. In this talk, based on the experience gained during this year, we will check those elements and recommendations which can change that perspective. We will review solutions for common problems and techniques to determine their root causes and minimize their impact. We also show new tools and tips to speed up the process.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">In the world of web development, things are always changing. The first portlet specification came out in October 2003 and, as one would expect, things have changed since then. With that in mind, we are proposing a new way of developing portlets that we think will add a lot of value for those wanting faster development speed, improved user experience with lightning fast navigations and state of the art technology like ES6 and Hybrid Rendering (isomorphic rendering). Come join us to see how SoyPortlet, Senna.js and Metal.js come together to provide a better experience for both developers and users.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: In the world of web development, things are always changing. The first portlet specification came out in October 2003 and, as one would expect, things have changed since then. With that in mind, we are proposing a new way of developing portlets that we think will add a lot of value for those wanting faster development speed, improved user experience with lightning fast navigations and state of the art technology like ES6 and Hybrid Rendering (isomorphic rendering). Come join us to see how SoyPortlet, Senna.js and Metal.js come together to provide a better experience for both developers and users.

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Através de experiências, sucessos, falhas e muita tentativa, aprendemos muito sobre como conduzir desenvolvimento de produto de forma colaborativa. Nesta sessão vamos compartilhar as nossas lições aprendidas, bem como algumas armadilhas. Acreditamos que muitas dessas experiências podem ser úteis para inúmeras equipes que enfrentam desafios semelhantes, valores, princípios e práticas podem ajudá-los a aumentar sua probabilidade de entregar valor mais rápido.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: Através de experiências, sucessos, falhas e muita tentativa, aprendemos muito sobre como conduzir desenvolvimento de produto de forma colaborativa. Nesta sessão vamos compartilhar as nossas lições aprendidas, bem como algumas armadilhas. Acreditamos que muitas dessas experiências podem ser úteis para inúmeras equipes que enfrentam desafios semelhantes, valores, princípios e práticas podem ajudá-los a aumentar sua probabilidade de entregar valor mais rápido.

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Luciana Silva, Project Manager da Liferay Latin America, experiência com gerenciamento de equipes ágeis localizadas e distribuídas. Movida a desafios e aprendizado. Como evangelista ágil, se sente responsável por ajudar as equipes a desenvolver novas habilidades, adotar estratégias colaborativas e a desenvolver a maneira como eleas são organizadas para refletir as novas formas de trabalhar.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Tenha acesso as últimas inovações em formulários para uso em marketing, suporte ao cliente e outras aplicações de negócio. Entenda o que de novo há no Liferay Forms para aumentar e melhorar o engajamento de seus clientes.</Description></root>
sessions.descriptionCurrentValue: Tenha acesso as últimas inovações em formulários para uso em marketing, suporte ao cliente e outras aplicações de negócio. Entenda o que de novo há no Liferay Forms para aumentar e melhorar o engajamento de seus clientes.

marketingEventUsers.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Charlles trabalha no time de produtos da Liferay. Ele é o responsável pela visão e estratégia da suite do Forms e Workflow. Anteriormente à Liferay, ele trabalhou em outras empresas de tecnologia no Brasil com gestão ágil de projetos. Além de ter trabalhado em outros mercados, passando por serviços financeiros, varejo a telecom. Charlles possui duas graduações: em Administração de Empresas e em Design Gráfico e um MBA em Gestão de Projetos. Ele é apaixonado por novas tecnologias e por descobrir formas de antecipar o futuro.</Description></root>

sessions.description: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><root available-locales="en_US" default-locale="en_US"><Description language-id="en_US">Aprenda alguns hacks da plataforma Liferay que podem ser úteis no dia-a-dia, como por exemplo executar uma DynamicQuery a partir de um template em FreeMarker, usar o console OSGi como ferramenta para ajudar no DevOps, proteger webservices não seguros de forma simples, dicas de prototipação e instrumentação não convencionais. Mas atenção, desenvolvedores abaixo de 17 anos apenas com acompanhamento dos pais!</Description></root>
